Title: Relates to implementing a moratorium on digital billboards and directing the commissioner of transportation to conduct a study on the impact of digital billboards on motor vehicle accidents
Summary: Relates to implementing a moratorium on the installation of new digital billboards and directing the commissioner of transportation to conduct a study on the impact of digital billboards on motor vehicle accidents.
LawCode: Add ยง397-b, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to implementing a moratorium on digital billboards and directing the commissioner of transportation to conduct a study on the impact of digital billboards on motor vehicle accidents
